name: Mini Bot
description:
My submission for the Kaijujam Game Jam!

The city is under attack by an endless horde of Kaiju. Take Command of Mini Bot in this Atari 2600-inspired twin-stick shooter and rescue as many civilians as you can before the city is overtaken by the horde!

Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot - LMB

Credits

Bombstu - Chiptune Sound Effects - Atari FX 09

                   Atari FX 02

edwardszakal - Score Beep

Euphrosynn - 8-bit Game Over

InspectorJ - Explosion 8-bit 01

mo-damage - Atari Speech Sample Pack - Start

pumodi - Explosion 3

Rocotilos - Game Over

thevoicesgames - retro explosion 2
